parameters.score_act_p25: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 25th percentile of the ACT cumulative score. (ACTCM25)
parameters.cost_avg_income_48_75k: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for $48,001-$75,000 family income (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT43_PRIV)
parameters.cost_avg_income_0_30k: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for $0-$30,000 family income (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT41_PRIV)
parameters.cost_room_board_off: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Cost of attendance: off-campus room and board. (ROOMBOARD_OFF)
parameters.score_sat_math_p75: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 75th percentile of SAT scores at the institution (math). (SATMT75)
parameters.score_act_p75: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 75th percentile of the ACT cumulative score. (ACTCM75)
parameters.rate_completion: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Completion rate for first-time, full-time students at four-year institutions (100% of expected time to completion). (C100_4)
parameters.score_sat_avg: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average SAT equivalent score of students admitted. (SAT_AVG)
parameters.id: ⁠[integer]⁠ A unique identifier for each institution. (UNITID)
parameters.score_sat_math_p25: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 25th percentile of SAT scores at the institution (math). (SATMT25)
parameters.score_sat_verbal_p75: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 75th percentile of SAT scores at the institution (critical reading). (SATVR75)
parameters.cost_avg_income_110k_plus: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for $110,000+ family income (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT45_PRIV)
parameters.cost_avg_income_75_110k: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for $75,001-$110,000 family income (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT44_PRIV)
parameters.score_sat_verbal_p25: ⁠[numeric]⁠ 25th percentile of SAT scores at the institution (critical reading). (SATVR25)
parameters.cost_room_board_on: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Cost of attendance: on-campus room and board. (ROOMBOARD_ON)
parameters.cost_books: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Cost of attendance: estimated books and supplies. (BOOKSUPPLY)
parameters.academic_year: ⁠[character]⁠ The academic year of the record.
parameters.amnt_earnings_med_10y: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Median earnings of students working and not enrolled 10 years after entry. (MD_EARN_WNE_P10)
parameters.cost_avg: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for Title IV institutions (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT4_PRIV)
parameters.rate_admissions: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Admission rate for all campuses rolled up to the 6-digit OPE ID. (ADM_RATE_ALL)
parameters.cost_avg_income_30_48k: ⁠[numeric]⁠ Average net price for $30,001-$48,000 family income (private for-profit and nonprofit institutions). (NPT42_PRIV)

description:
Description
Historical data from the U.S. College Scorecard dataset. The data includes
historical information on the number of students, average cost, median
earnings after graduations, rates of admission and completion, and ACT and
SAT test scores.
The data set contain only colleges that participate in Title IV federal
financial aid programs. In the tidy data set, column names have been changed
for readability and consistency.
You can find the original data set at the U.S. Department of Education's
College Scorecard website. The
code for the data transformation process is available at
https://github.com/gadenbuie/scorecard-db.
title: College Scorecard: Scorecard Data
format:
A data frame with 183,306 rows and 24 variables. Original column
names from the source dataset are noted in parenthesis.
